name: Small And Not Complex Turret Ultra Module
name_original: Small And Not Complex Turret Ultra Module
description:
made in a day for jam between friends :>

made by: Frogrammer &THX

Controls:

1, 2, 3 to switch layers, 4 to view all

[LMB] build, [RMB] destroy

[LMB] on ROAD to switch the direction

[SPACE] hide/show TURRETs

[TAB] to close/open

Protect the Sanctum!
